name: Luxurious Sea-Lord
desc: The great king of the ocean. Having been air-dried, it makes for a fine weapon as well as emergency sustenance.
skill_desc: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that charges and deals 100%/125%/150%/175%/200% ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.
